column5: 4 of us are looking for some new areas in Canada to try this July and would like some input on the following locations: Northwoods Outposts Sioux Lookout Wapeoi Lake Aerofoil Lake Morris Camp Neobe Lake Indianonta Resort Calm Lake Birchdale Resort Eagle Lake Would like comments as to quality of camp, fishing and general info. Thanks.

Can't say anything good or bad about Birchdale but if you are going to Eagle Lake I can say that Vermilion Bay Lodge is a nice place to go. You don't have all the hastles of people tripping over each other and the owner and his family are real nice people. Check out his web site at www.vermilionbaylodge.com
